Lmod

System Management

Environment module management for scientific computing. Provides dynamic loading and unloading of software modules in HPC environments.

1.0.0 Version
4 Actions
Jan 15 Updated
Python Language

Installation Methods

Global Installation

uv pip install scientific-mcps

Individual MCP Installation

uv pip install "scientific-mcps[lmod]"

Direct Server

uv run mcp_lmod

Claude Desktop Configuration

{ "mcpServers": { "lmod": { "command": "uv", "args": ["run", "mcp_lmod"] } } }

Available Actions

  • list_modules
    List available modules in the environment
    Parameters: category, filter_pattern
  • load_module
    Load a module into the environment
    Parameters: module_name, version
  • unload_module
    Unload a module from the environment
    Parameters: module_name
  • get_info
    Get information about a specific module
    Parameters: module_name

Usage Examples

Module Management

// List available modules list_modules(category: "compiler") // Load required modules load_module("gcc", version: "11.2.0") load_module("python", version: "3.9.0") // Get module information get_info("gcc") // Unload when done unload_module("gcc")

HPC Workflow Integration

// Set up environment for job load_module("gcc", "11.2.0") load_module("openmpi", "4.1.0") load_module("python", "3.9.0") // Submit job with loaded modules submit_job( job_script: "#!/bin/bash\n#SBATCH --job-name=simulation\nmpirun ./simulation", nodes: 4 )
